title: Landing Page
description: The landing page provides an online presence for individuals and small organizations. I make landing page websites for various categories like portfolio, sales service ( Photography, Graphic Design, Editing, Marketing ), small shops, and organizations.

title: E-commerce Website
description: It doesn't require explaining why and who needs an e-commerce website. I build multi-vendor e-commerce applications with exclusive features.  If I tell the feature list briefly, that's authentication, cart, product upload, search, price calculation, and payment method.

title: Business Website
description: It's impossible to imagine running a business without a proper website. I offer websites for every corporate-level work. I make it from small tea shops to highly luxurious real-estate websites.

title: Copy/Clone Website
description: Save time and effort by leveraging the success of top-performing websites. Customize the cloned site to match your brand and captivate your target market. Propel your business to new heights with my ready-made solution.

title: Fix Bug & Error
description: It's a very common issue that websites are sometimes attacked by unwanted bugs & errors. I solve the bugs and errors for javascript and typescript codebase.

title: Feature Integrate
description: We need to integrate different features for various reasons in our existing projects. I integrate new features like payment gateway, user experience, and many more. I also work for website's better looking and smooth feeling.
